document.full_text: a former deputy foreign minister is the highest-profile politician to be sentenced in a series of trials that has been purging the beleaguered opposition in the former soviet republic.
document.title: belarus opposition leader gets a five-year sentence
lines_and_colors: a former deputy foreign minister is the highest-profile politician to be sentenced in a series of trials that has been purging the beleaguered opposition in the former soviet republic.
